title: 1.7.2正版安装安装Forge后无法运行
author: heroesmail
txt_content:
我在files.minecraftForge.net上下载1.7.2的Forge，安装之后用正版登陆器无法启动游戏，提时代码如下：


[19:13:45] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[19:13:45] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Using primary tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[19:13:45] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[19:13:45] [main/INFO] [FML]: Forge Mod Loader version 7.2.217.1147 for Minecraft 1.7.2 loading
[19:13:45] [main/INFO] [FML]: Java is Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM, version 1.8.0_25, running on Windows 8.1:amd64:6.3, installed at C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_25
[19:13:45] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker
[19:13:45] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLDeobfTweaker
[19:13:45] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker
[19:13:45] [main/ERROR] [LaunchWrapper]: Unable to launch
java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
        at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.checkForComodification(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_25]
        at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.remove(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_25]
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:117) [launchwrapper-1.9.jar:?]
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28) [launchwrapper-1.9.jar:?]
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM warning: Using incremental CMS is deprecated and will likely be removed in a future release




但是1.7.2原版就可以运行，只有Forge版不能运行，安装Forge的时候也提示安装成功。
Java版本是8u25，Java应该没什么问题
请各位看看这是什么情况，谢谢

replies.txt_content: 據說舊版forge和java8不兼容，裝個java7試試
